name: Double Octopus
description:
~HELP~

  • K key to start de game and attack/shoot
  • L key to change octopus
  • WASD to move
  • The blue octopus is melee, attack the blue alien 3 times to destroy it.
  • The pink octopus is ranged, attack the pink alien 2 times to destroy it.
  • But be careful because both aliens can destroy you.

~DESCRIPTION~

The player will be a genetically modified alien octopus with a split personality, and you will try to escape from a ship that is a special laboratory.

Prototype programmed in the second semester of the first year of the videogame design and development career at Usek University in different courses: 

  • Workshop 1 with Professor Pablo Gorigoitía and assistant Nicolás Flores.
  • Programming II with the professorFelipe Weason.
  • Basic Sciences II with the professor Benjamín Blas.
